MS MCQs

    Define an AI strategy to create value in government - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. How can governments strengthen their AI outcomes?

      Replace employees with conversational agents.

      Leave it to AI experts to plan for and execute an AI solution.

      Establish data practices that make it easier to collect and aggregate data from a variety of sources.

      Focus on internal uses of AI above citizen-facing uses.


    2. Which of the following will most likely help an AI solution perform more effectively?

      Spending more money on the development of the AI solution.

      Leveraging domain experts.

      Developing the solution in-house.

      Using more complex algorithms.


    3. A local government is considering implementing an AI solution. Which criteria should it consider when choosing the best use case to start with?

      Value creation.

      Cost reduction.

      Work reduction for employees.

      Difficulty of data cleansing.
